synopsis.text: Mana, the life-giving energy of colossal beings known as Luna, once powered a thriving civilization. Yet, a catastrophic tsunami wiped out this prosperous world, forcing the remnants of life to retreat underground. Ten millennia later, the tale unfolds beneath the surface, centering around two peculiar creatures: Mokugyo, a fish adorned with flourishing flora on its back, and Toriiruka, an outspoken entity. Joined by the solitary, spiky creature Harry and Yona, a descendant of the ancient civilization tasked with its rebirth, the group embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries of their subterranean existence. Will Mokugyo and Toriiruka find a way to return to the surface and rediscover the lost world above?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
